__e: What matters to me, without discussion, is that I have every right to dispose of my family estate as I see fit, and the house's fate should be decided by the rightful owner and not by these usurpers.
- Why not? Because when you're friends with someone for three years, it's weird to steal their family's money.
It's the closest thing I have to a family heirloom.
'Cause if it is, the best thing for her legacy is if she's assassinated before she starts showing.
Your legacy is all you have now.
Okay, I'm sorry, but my getting my inheritance is a matter of life or death.
I have a legacy to protect,william,and glee club is a part of that legacy,and I will win. And if it means I have to get you fired to do it... so be it.
Maybe I'd have a legacy of my own apart from my family.
A son shouldn't talk to his mother about inheritance!
So, I guess I'll be keeping this precious family heirloom... 'cause those are the rules in polite society, aren't they?
Yes,well,it's not the first thing I like to blurt out when I meet new people, but now I seem to have lost my only family heirloom.
You don't want to diminish your legacy of righteousness because of him... which is why you're going to surrender.
Your brother shall have all your inheritance and you can starve on the streets for all I care.
My good lady, a great evil has taken control of your legacy, and for your sake and the sake of all of your children, trust us.
They stole his legacy and mine. Well, you're right, of course.
